mapper.delete: delete from manufacturer where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.insert: insert into manufacturer ( name, description, created_timestamp, last_modified_timestamp, version ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1 )
mapper.update: update manufacturer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modified_timestamp = #{lastModifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
